item.title: CVE-2024-31084|2024-03-31T19:35:50.256Z -- Pulsar Web Design -- Weekly Class Schedule
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pulsar Web Design Weekly Class Schedule allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Weekly Class Schedule: from n/a through 3.19.
